thread.title: Great location, lovely staff and delicieous breakfast
thread.title_full: Great location, lovely staff and delicieous breakfast - Review of Hotel Duette, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: annadQ9388XB
title: Great location, lovely staff and delicieous breakfast
text: Our room was cozy, warm and had everything one would need for a short hotel stay. The hotel was located in close proximity to a beautiful Parisian park, and the street of the hotel turns into market in the weekends which allows you to taste different delicacies.
